name: Unreal Vendetta
description:
You are a successful thief who periodically makes forays into various dungeons in search of treasures and wealth! Every outing you play with death, because the dungeons are full of traps and monsters that are ready to destroy you! Also on your way you will meet an underground merchant ready to offer you an interesting product!



Arm yourself with the best weapons, powerful artifacts and go on an adventure! Complete tasks and get generous rewards!



As the game progresses, you will move through various rooms, which can be filled with various enemies or treasures.
